title: MySQLTAN()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLTAN()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the tangent of a number:
SELECT TAN(1.75);

Definition and Usage
The TAN() function returns the tangent of a number.
Syntax
TAN(
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number
Required. A numeric value
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Return the tangent of a number:
SELECT TAN(-3);

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLTAN()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLTAN()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
